exceptions.tactic: apply ex_RInt_ext with (g := fun y : R => opp (f (- y))).
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V s : SF_seq f' : SF_sorted Rle s a := SF_h s : R b := last (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s)) : R H : V -> Prop Unable to unify "exists If : V, is_RInt ?M2365 ?M2367 ?M2368 If" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball (Riemann_sum f s) eps y -> H y".

Illegal application: The term "@SF_map" of type "forall T T0 : Type, (T -> T0) -> SF_seq -> SF_seq" cannot be applied to the terms "S" : "Set" "NormedModule.sort R_AbsRing V" : "Type" "f" : "R -> V" "s" : "SF_seq" The 3rd term has type "R -> V" which should be coercible to "S -> V".
